question: How does the school plan for the year and implement the plan?
labels: The teachers and school leaders come together every 3 months to review their progress towards improving the school

question: Comments and Reflection:
Based on your answers, please mark a level
How does the school ensure that the leaders (school head and coordinators if any) are continuoulsy learning?
labels: The leadership team undergoes at least 10 days or 60 hours of capacity building sessions in a year

question: Comments and Reflection:
Based on your answers, please mark a level
How does the school support the training of teachers?
labels: Teachers attend trainings for improving their subject knowledge and teaching method

question: Comments and Reflection:
Based on your answers, please mark a level
How does the school evaluate and provide feedback to teachers on teaching practices?
labels: Teachers are observed and given feedback on his/ her teaching practices

question: Comments and Reflection:
Based on your answers, please mark a level
How does the school promote a holistic/ overall growth of the studens?
labels: School conducts a minimum of 1 hour per day of varied co-curricular activities (example playtime, art, music etc) for each grade

question: Comments and Reflection:
Based on your answers, please mark a level
What is the Pupil Teacher Ratio?
labels: School has a Pupil Teacher Ratio of 40:1 in Middle and Secondary (G6-12)

options.label: The teachers and school leaders come together every 3 months to review their progress towards improving the school
Parents' inputs are taken when the plan for the year for the school is made
Me and my team(coordinators of the school) know the about the things that the school needs to improve on
School has a school development plan for the year

The plan for the year of the school has
goals for improvement in all areas - academics, non-academics and school operations with defined roles of who will work on which areas
Teachers' inputs are taken when the school plans for the year
All teachers in the school put efforts towards school improvement with respect to the duties assigned to them
